mutants.code:
def maximize_prime_prefix_sums(n, tiles):
    n1 = tiles.count(1)
    n2 = tiles.count(2)
    result = []
    if n1 == 0 and n2 == 0:
        result = tiles
    else:
        result.append(2)
        result.append(1)
        n1 -= 1
        n2 -= 1
        while n2 != 0:
            result.append(2)
            n2 -= 1
        while n1 != 0:
            result.append(1)
            n1 -= 1
    return result

    return result
